## This is my map using leaflet for the peer review
## I added a circle and a popup


```{r cars}
library(leaflet)

mbfc_map <-leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircles(lat=1.2803,lng=103.8543, weight=3, color="red", radius=250,  popup="Marina Bay Financial Centre")
mbfc_map

```
